description.value:
At 20th level, you become a master of the connections between the mortal world and the spirit world. Your knowledge enables you to gain incredible insight and control over others by manipulating spiritual energy. You gain an insight bonus equal to your Charisma modifier to your AC and on all saving throws and Knowledge checks.

Additionally, once per day, you may cast extended dominate monster as a spell-like ability. With this ability, you may dominate a number of creatures equal to double your Charisma modifier.
